name: Gretchen V.
review: Perfect experience a second time with Perfection Auto Spa, cannot recommend highly enough!!! Thank you, Canyon!!

name: Lindsey D.
review: Canyon always does a great job on my vehicle!! You never have to question what you are paying for because it’s very noticeable with how good of a job he does. The attention to detail is outstanding and the communication is great. Thanks again!

name: David D.
review: Absolutely pleased with my truck! From the first message sent Canyon was very responsive and polite. Very professional much like his detailing. I’ll be using Canyon for all my detailing needs in the future. Such an amazing hard working young man!

name: Fred D.
review: Absolutely pleased with my truck! From the first message sent Canyon was very responsive and polite. Very professional much like his detailing. I’ll be using Canyon for all my detailing needs in the future. Such an amazing hard working young man!

name: Danny L.
review: Couldn’t be more happy with the result Canyon provided on my truck. They were so professional and thorough and my truck has never been as clean. Literally more clean than when I drove it off the lot 2.5 years ago. I highly encourage anyone looking for a detail to use them.

name: Chad H.
review: Canyon did a great job detailing my truck and my wife’s SUV. Both vehicles were spotless, inside and out! I’m very pleased with the results and definitely would highly recommend him! We’ll be using him again the next time we need our vehicles detailed.

name: Penny B.
review: Highly recommend this service. Outstanding job on my jeep. Coming to my house to do it was a big plus. Very reasonably priced too.

name: Marcy S.
review: I could not be happier with the job Canyon did on my Mercedes! His eye for detail is spot on. He went above and beyond, I’m still in disbelief he got most all the blue stain out of my leather. He was on time, worked hard the entire time, and was extremely professional. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him, and I plan to hire him again when the car is ready for another detail. Thank you!

name: Jake L.
review: He did a great job. He showed up at 8:30 and I asked him to wrap it up around 3:30 because I needed to head to my golf league. He may have stayed all night to make sure it was perfect. Very reasonable rates for 7-passenger SUV. Still smells great 2 weeks later.

name: Mike M.
review: Don’t hesitate….book it. Very impressed by the service and communication. Finished product is even better than expected. Highly recommend.

name: Greg M.
review: Really great service, professional, great price, couldn't be more impressed. Made the cream colored suede seats in my car look great again. Will be a repeat customer.

name: Mark P.
review: Canyon did an awesome job on my car and my friends cars. Hard worker. Excellent work ethic. Give him a try

name: Ryan Z.
review: Contacted via text. Worked me in within a few days. On time to my place in Palm City and did a great job. Will use again!

name: Carolyn R.
review: Canyon is such a nice gentleman and one of those young businessman that you feel you have to spread the word around so he can continue to succeed. He made my 08 Volvo almost new again. I was stunned at how it came out. I’m no longer embarrassed about my vehicle. Great to work with, fair in price and gives you options to fit your budget. Great job Canyon!  Carolyn
